name: targets
schema:
CREATE TABLE `targets` (
	`id` text PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
	`name` text NOT NULL,
	`slug` text NOT NULL,
	`description` text,
	`category` text,
	`vendor` text,
	`website` text,
	`logo` text,
	`created_at` integer,
	`updated_at` integer,
	FOREIGN KEY (`category`) REFERENCES `categories`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action,
	FOREIGN KEY (`vendor`) REFERENCES `organizations`(`id`) ON UPDATE no action ON DELETE no action
)
